metadata.title: CVE-2018-14624 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in 389-ds-base through versions 1.3.7.10, 1.3.8.8 and 1.4.0.16. The lock controlling the error log was not correctly used when re-opening the log file in log__error_emergency(). An attacker could send a flood of modifications to a very large DN, which would cause slapd to crash.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.0.18-1').
